alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Itawamba and northern Monroe Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 353 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Wren, or near Amory, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, Smithville, New Wren, Nettleton, Hatley, Gattman, Sipsey Fork, Becker, Quincy, Splunge, Wise Gap, Athens, Wren, Bigbee, Greenwood Springs and Parham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
